mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_studentInfo(number, name, telephone, category, originalClass, presentClass, sex, dorm, note, GPA, realGPA, stuFrom, division, entranceScore, admissionScore, gradeOne, gradeTwo, totalGrade, rank, CREATEUSER, createTime, updateTime, status) VALUES ( #{number}, #{name}, #{telephone}, #{category}, #{originalClass}, #{presentClass}, #{sex}, #{dorm}, #{note} #{GPA}, #{realGPA}, #{stuFrom}, #{division}, #{entranceScore}, #{admissionScore}, #{gradeOne}, #{gradeTwo}, #{totalGrade}, #{rank}, #{CREATEUSER}, from_unixtime(#{createTime})) ON duplicate KEY SET #{name}, #{telephone}, #{category}, #{originalClass}, #{presentClass}, #{sex}, #{dorm}, #{note} #{GPA}, #{realGPA}, #{stuFrom}, #{division}, #{entranceScore}, #{admissionScore}, #{gradeOne}, #{gradeTwo}, #{totalGrade}, #{rank}, #{CREATEUSER}, from_unixtime(#{updateTime}))
mapper.select: SELECT number, name, telephone, category, originalClass, presentClass, sex, dorm, note, GPA, realGPA, stuFrom, division, entranceScore, admissionScore, gradeOne, gradeTwo, totalGrade, rank, CREATEUSER, createTime, updateTime, status FROM t_studentInfo WHERE number = #{number}
